      • copyFile

        private void copyFile(File sourceFile)
               throws IOException
        Copy given file to target root dir if matches include/exclude patterns. If properties pattern is applicable, it copies only matching keys.
        Parameters:
        sourceFile - source file
        Throws:
        IOException - if copying fails

      • getRelativePath

        private static String getRelativePath(File root,
                                      File file)
        Returns slash separated path relative to given root.

      • copyFile

        private static void copyFile(File sourceFile,
                             File targetFile)
                      throws IOException
        Copy source file to target file. It creates necessary sub folders.
        Parameters:
        sourceFile - source file
        targetFile - target file
        Throws:
        IOException - if copying fails

      • matchingKeys

        private Set<String> matchingKeys(String relativePath,
                                 String propertiesPattern)
                          throws IOException
        Returns set of keys matching given pattern.
        Parameters:
        relativePath - path relative to sourceRoot
        propertiesPattern - pattern like file.properties#keyPattern
        Returns:
        set of matching keys, never null
        Throws:
        IOException - if properties cannot be loaded

      • getProperties

        private org.openide.util.EditableProperties getProperties(String relativePath)
                                                   throws IOException
        Returns properties from relative path.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        properties from relative path.
        Throws:
        IOException - if cannot open stream

      • readPatterns

        private void readPatterns(Reader r)
                   throws IOException
        Reads the include/exclude set from a given reader.
        Parameters:
        r - reader
        Throws:
        IOException

      • parsePattern

        private static Set<String> parsePattern(String pattern)
        Parses given compound string pattern into set of single patterns.
        Parameters:
        pattern - compound pattern in form filePattern1#keyPattern1#|filePattern2#keyPattern2#|filePattern3
        Returns:
        set of single patterns containing just one # (e.g. [filePattern1#keyPattern1, filePattern2#keyPattern2, filePattern3])
